content: as double_crochet 2dc in chain-2 space turn row 2 chain-3 double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet turn repeat row 2 until strap measures approximately 9 10 sl-st the last row of the strap to the chain-2 space in corner 2 fasten_off strap edging join yarn to any stitch near the middle of the armpit chain-1 single_crochet in each st across to strap work 2sc in side of each double_crochet of strap single_crochet in each of remaining st in armpit sl- st to join to first single_crochet fasten_off repeat for opposite arm hole © 2017 right brain crochet www facebook com/rightbraincrochet/ right brain crochet@gmail com right brain crochet 6 neckline join yarn to any stitch at the back of the neckline chain-1 single_crochet in each st across to strap work 2sc in side of each double_crochet of strap single_crochet in each st across to next strap work 2sc in side of each double_crochet of strap single_crochet in each of remaining st in neckline sl-st to join to first single_crochet fasten_off weave in all ends thank you for downloading my pattern please feel free to use items made from this pattern for personal use gifts local craft shows or charity fundraising permission to sell items made from this pattern in retail or online must be granted by the designer this pattern is not for reproduction or resale if you have any questions about fair usage of this pattern or questions about the directions please contact me at right brain crochet@gmail com thanks jennifer ӧzses © 2017 right brain crochet www facebook com/rightbraincrochet/ right brain crochet@gmail com
